! Example of SQE input file for SnSe

&basic
ntypes = 2 
natoms = 8
nsize = 2 3 3
/

&inputsqe
elements = "Se" "Sn"
nat = 4 4
temp = 100.d0
lneutron = .TRUE.
lxray = .FALSE.
qmesh = 20 20 20
write_rmsd = .TRUE.
! read_rmsd = .TRUE.
path = 1 0 0
ne = 200
dE = 0.05
nqlong = 200
nqperpen = 5
dL = 0.01
dP = 0.006
q0 = 0.d0 0.d0 2.d0
nonanalytic = .FALSE.
lresfunc = .TRUE.
functype = "CNCS12"
xm = 2
/

LATTICE_PARAMETERS
   1.0
    11.4378866699999993    0.0000000000000000    0.0000000000000000
     0.0000000000000000    4.1475032699999996    0.0000000000000000
     0.0000000000000000    0.0000000000000000    4.3488168700000003

Direct

   0.6433378700000000  0.2500000000000000  0.9789547300000000
   0.1433378700000000  0.2500000000000000  0.5210452700000000
   0.8566621300000000  0.7500000000000000  0.4789547300000000
   0.6175194800000000  0.7500000000000000  0.4072883000000000
   0.3824805200000000  0.2500000000000000  0.5927117000000000
   0.8824805200000000  0.2500000000000000  0.9072883000000000
   0.1175194800000000  0.7500000000000000  0.0927117000000000
